caption: In a room, two women are engaged in conversation. As they speak, a man enters, shares a few words with them, and subsequently, they are led outside. This man and one of the women then stroll hand in hand down a broad avenue lined with blooming flowers. Their expressions radiate joy. Their journey leads them to a gathering where they encounter an elderly woman of seemingly high stature and regal bearing. The elderly woman ushers them to a pavilion situated by the sea, and they all take a seat, immersing themselves in further discourse. The younger woman, moved by emotion, begins to recount certain grievances to the elder, who, upon hearing them, is overtaken by indignation, vowing to seek redress on her behalf.
